items.name: Alchemical Fire
items.description: An incredibly noxious black oil, alchemically brewed from salamander bile. Always stored in tightly stoppered clay flasks, sealed with wax. Explodes in a fireball causing 5d6 damage in a 10′ radius.

consumption_effect.description: Explodes in fireball causing 5d6 damage in 10' radius; Save for half

items.name: Anti-Magic Balm
items.description: A pearlescent white balm with a sweet aroma that brings to mind memories of childhood. Dispels enchantments on a creature or temporarily renders an object non-magical.

consumption_effect.description: Dispels enchantments on creatures or temporarily renders objects non-magical

items.name: Brewmaster's Balsam
items.description: A black gloop in a sturdy glass jar shaped like a miniature cauldron. Tastes sweet and syrupy with an undertone of beef dripping. Heals 1d4 Hit Points if used within 1 Turn; soporific effect: –1 to AC and Saving Throws.
items.taste: Sweet and syrupy with undertone of beef dripping

consumption_effect.description: Heals 1d4 HP if used within 1 Turn; -1 AC and saves (soporific)

items.name: Dimensional Solvent, Gold
items.description: A noxious smelling, metallic gold oil. Shrink to 6″ tall.

consumption_effect.description: Shrink subject to 6 inches tall

items.name: Dimensional Solvent, Silver
items.description: A noxious smelling, metallic silver oil. Double in size; double melee damage.

consumption_effect.description: Double subject's size; double melee damage

items.name: Deorling Balm
items.description: A resinous, white balm brewed from pine sap and needles. Heals 1d6 HP or 1d6 Constitution.

consumption_effect.description: Heals 1d6 HP or 1d6 Constitution

items.name: Holy Oil
items.description: Sweet-smelling, amber oil blessed by a saint of the Pluritine Church. Stored in ceramic flasks engraved with holy liturgies. 3d8 damage to undead monsters.

consumption_effect.description: 3d8 damage to undead; continuous damage

items.name: Hunter's Balm
items.description: A transparent, yellowish balm that has the scent of a different animal each time it is smelled. Makes subject scentless.

consumption_effect.description: Makes subject completely scentless

items.name: Morphic Unguent
items.description: A syrupy, orange balm that smells of tar. Alter form into any imagined humanoid form.

consumption_effect.description: Alter form into any imagined humanoid form

items.name: Nebulous Ointment
items.description: A fluffy, grey ointment that smells of rain and feels like wisps of cloud. Makes subject unable to sink in water.

consumption_effect.description: Makes subject unable to sink in water

items.name: Oil of Sharpness
items.description: A fine, golden oil with a subtle, rainbow-hued scintillance. Makes a bladed weapon magical; +2 to Attack and Damage Rolls.

consumption_effect.description: Makes bladed weapon magical; +2 to Attack and Damage

items.name: Oil of St Signis
items.description: A thin, iridescent black oil with an odour of mothballs. Preserves a corpse indefinitely.

consumption_effect.description: Preserves a corpse indefinitely; prevents undeath

items.name: Ointment of Weightlessness
items.description: A thick, slippery balm of scintillating, pearly hue. Smells of fresh rain. Renders a creature or object weightless.

consumption_effect.description: Renders creature or object weightless

items.name: Orgon's Sovereign Lubricant
items.description: A thin, pinkish oil with a metallic odour. Makes a creature or object impossible to grasp.

consumption_effect.description: Makes creature or object impossible to grasp

items.name: Phantasmal Unguent
items.description: An obsidian balm twinkling with silver motes. Renders a solid object intangible.

consumption_effect.description: Renders solid object intangible

items.name: Salve of Repulsion
items.description: A cream-coloured, oily balm whose odour is utterly repulsive to creatures of one specific species or Kindred. Emits a scent repulsive to a specific type of creature.

consumption_effect.description: Emits scent repulsive to specific creature type

items.name: Solvent of Whispers
items.description: A slightly transparent oil of deep indigo hue that emits sibilant noises when moved. Smells faintly of almonds. Renders a subject utterly silent.

consumption_effect.description: Renders subject utterly silent

items.name: Spectral Oil
items.description: A thin, transparent oil with a slightly iridescent hue, stored in opaque clay flasks. Makes creatures or objects insubstantial, like a ghost.

consumption_effect.description: Makes creatures or objects insubstantial like a ghost

items.name: Thieves' Salve
items.description: An indigo salve found in tiny quantities in miniature crystal jars. Smells of musty crypts. Grants the ability to smell treasure.

consumption_effect.description: Grants ability to smell treasure (blocked by lead)

items.name: Viridescent Balm
items.description: A deep emerald green balm that smells of spring rain. Cures all diseases and poisons or permanently grants +1 HP.

consumption_effect.description: Cures all diseases and poisons OR permanently grants +1 HP
